Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This unique item is not just a product; it's an experience that promises to elevate your daily routine. Given its exceptional quality and craftsmanship, we believe it's worth more than $80 to you. To make this opportunity even more appealing, I'm extending a special offer of $120 for you to consider. Please let me know if this aligns with your expectations or if you have any questions about the product. I look forward to your response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
